content.question: For what value of <math alttext="k" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>, if any, is <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> continuous?

choices.label: There is no such value of <math alttext="k" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
